brainly_data.question:
Ted’s assignment during science was to list in his science journal the four properties used to identify a mineral. Ted listed hardness, color, and texture. Ted was having trouble thinking of the last property. What property is Ted missing?
A) brightness
B) luster
C) Taste
D) weight
brainly_data.subject: Biology
